articles.content: Rising star Josh Philippe has pulled out of this year's IPL after a hectic summer that saw him make his international debut, but it remains unclear if he will return for Western Australia this season… [+3007 chars]

articles.author: Owen Leonard
articles.title: ‘A load of BS’: Suns president slams call on daytime grand final - The Age
articles.description: Tony Cochrane played a key role in coordinating last year’s inaugural night grand final at the Gabba and says evening deciders are crucial to the growth of the game.
articles.content:
Gold Coast president Tony Cochrane has scorned the AFLs call to revert to tradition and stage the grand final during the day.
I have a view, a very strong view, and Im not changing my view, he said.… [+1525 chars]

articles.title: Transfer Centre: Canberra Raiders re-sign Hudson Young - Fox Sports
articles.description: Canberra have extended Hudson Young’s deal to ensure the back-rower remains in green until the end of the 2024.
articles.content:
Young was coming off contract later this year and inked a new deal on the eve of the season.
The 22-year-old is expected to take up John Batemans right edge spot in the second row for 2021, with the… [+18336 chars]
